-- note: Once RxJS 5.0 is available, switch to it.
--       Currently it can be used with "@reactivex/rxjs": ">= 5.0.0-alpha.12"
name: svg.rx.js
description: Bridge of SVG graphics (svg.js) and Reactive Extensions (rx-lite or rxjs).
-- These are as dependencies so that demo symbolic links will get them.
-- 'devDependencies' would download but it gives the wrong impression. They are needed for using the code, but
--   we don't really want to carry them over in the 'svg.rx.js' packaging. The user should inject them via some
--   other means. tbd. What's the best way to describe this in npm packaging? AKa100116

scripts: -- Don't use script name 'publish' - it's reserved for pushing the npm package to npm repo.
